team-members-dialog-rmmember-title: Remove a healthcare professional from the team <1>{{teamName}}</1>
team-members-dialog-rmmember-question: Are you sure you want to remove <1>{{hcpName}}</1> from this medical team?
team-members-dialog-rmmember-consequence: They will no longer have access to patients data.
team-modal-create-info: This information will be displayed along your name when you invite a new patient or a team member. They will review this information to verify your identity. Please make sure it is accurate.
team-modal-create-warning: By creating this medical team, your account will become its administrator by default. You can invite other healthcare professionals and manage user permissions at anytime.
team-modal-create-warning-2: By accepting our {{terms-and-conditions}} you confirm you are a registered healthcare professional in your country and have the right to create a medical team.
modal-add-patient-legal-placeholder: By inviting a patient, you recognize that you have the right to do so per our Terms of Use.
modal-team-code-descr-placeholder: Communicate this identification code to your patient during a consultation so they can verify your identity.
modal-team-code-descr-placeholder-2: This identification code is always available in the team information on the “My teams”page.
modal-leave-team-info: Are you sure you want to leave this medical team?
modal-leave-team-info-2: You will no longer have access to your patients data.
modal-leave-team-last-title: Leave and delete a medical team
modal-leave-team-last-info: Since you are the only member in this team, {{teamName}} will be permanently deleted if you leave it.
modal-leave-team-last-info-2: You will no longer have access to your patients data. This action can't be undone.
modal-leave-team-unique-admin-info: Since you are the only team's administrator, you need to give administrator permission to another member before leaving.
hcp-account-preferences-title: Update your personal info and preferences
hcp-account-preferences-success: Your preferences have been successfully saved.
hcp-account-preferences-error: Your preferences have not been saved.
modal-add-medical-team-code-info-2: Ask your healthcare provider for their unique identification code.
modal-delete-member: Remove a healthcare professional from the team
modal-delete-member-info: Are you sure you want to remove {{hcpName}} from this medical team?
modal-delete-member-info-2: They will no longer have access to patients data.
modal-delete-member-success: Healthcare professional is no longer part of your medical team.
modal-delete-patient-info: Are you sure you want to stop monitoring {{patientName}}?
modal-delete-patient-info-2: You and your team members will no longer have access to their data.
modal-delete-patient-success: Patient is no longer monitored by your medical team
modal-patient-share-team-title: Share your data with a medical team
modal-patient-share-team-info: Your healthcare professional invites you to share your data with
modal-patient-share-team-warning: Please verify that the above details match the information provided by your healthcare professional before accepting the invitation.
modal-patient-share-team-privacy: By accepting this invitation you consent to share your personal data with the members of this team, who are healthcare professionals registered on YourLoops.
modal-patient-share-team-success: Your medical team has now access to your data.
modal-patient-add-team-title: Share your data with a medical team
modal-patient-add-team-info: You are about to share you data with
modal-patient-add-team-warning: Please verify that the above details match the information provided by your healthcare professional before accepting the invitation.
modal-patient-add-team-privacy: By adding this team, you consent to share your personal data with its members, who are healthcare professionals registered on YourLoops.
modal-patient-add-team-success: Your medical team has now access to your data.
modal-patient-remove-caregiver-info: Are you sure you want to remove {{caregiverName}}?
modal-patient-remove-caregiver-info-2: They will no longer have access to your data.
modal-patient-remove-caregiver-success: Your caregiver has no longer access to your data.
modal-patient-remove-team-info: Are you sure you want to remove {{teamName}}?
modal-patient-remove-team-info-2: Your healthcare provider and their team will no longer have access to your data and its history.
modal-patient-remove-team-success: Your medical team has no longer access to your data.
modal-remove-patient-info: Are you sure you want to remove {{patientName}}?
modal-remove-patient-info-2: You will no longer have access to their data.
modal-remove-patient-success: You no longer have access to this patient data.
